Title: 💥💥💥💥🔊ANN][ADITUS 🍷] Luxury Access Platform for Crypto-Affluents
Body: Hello everyone,  The Aditus Initial Token Sale closes soon.  Aditus aims to solve the dual problems of engagement and payment in the luxury industry, an industry we know very well.  And we are doing this in the backdrop of rising crypto-currency values, which is creating more crypto-affluents everyday.  As the token sale enters its last two days, we are also shifting gears to prepare for the alpha launch of our product in Phuket RendezVous, a large scale yacht and luxury show held on 4-7 January 2018, held at the Royal Phuket Marina.  Throughout this token sale process, we have gotten support from many old friends who have known us in our past businesses, and also gotten the support of many new ones.  All are excited about the prospect of a crypto-business based on rolling out real solutions in the market, among real merchants and users, and being the global first mover in this multi-billiondollar space.  If you would like to join us on this journey, please click on: https://tokensale.aditus.net Looking forward to your participation!

Author: cryptomeo
Title: 💥💥💥💥🔊ANN][ADITUS 🍷] Luxury Access Platform for Crypto-Affluents
Body: Another great article on Aditus  Luxury For The Crypto-affluent: Introducing The Aditus Network    The Spirit of the Future, Engineered Today. The GRAY team has sought to realise this goal through our creations since day one, striving to bring luxury and technology together in our image. Today, we spotlight a company working to realise the same goals, but through the perspective of blockchain technology. Introducing the Aditus Network.  Barely a week ago, the value of bitcoin reached a record high of $10,000USD, marking yet another milestone for the cryptocurrency community that just a couple of months ago, was celebrating the value of bitcoin reaching $1,000USD.  What does this mean for all the newly minted crypto-affluents? It is apparent that there currently exists an awkward relationship between these crypto-affluents and the traditional luxury community. On one hand, many crypto-affluents are frustrated that the luxury industry is slow to warm up to them, and many of the exclusive events, services and products remain closed off to them, leaving them excluded by merchants. On the other, luxury brands continue to struggle with how to reach out to the crypto-affluent community, understanding their needs and acknowledging their rightful place among the 1%. Few luxury merchants have come to embrace cryptocurrency as a viable form of payments, and many more are grasping with the notion that the crypto-affluent are a more reserved, privacy-conscious group that requires more attention.  This problem of access, on both sides of the coin is what Aditus is attempting to resolve. As the first dedicated luxury access platform serving crypto-affluents, Aditus aims to create a decentralised platform to empower crypto-users to enjoy a platform into the world of luxury products and services in complete privacy, allowing them to make purchases with the crypto-currency of their choice. For merchants, this means access to a new niche of customers, engaging with them without a middleman while continuing to respect their privacy.  The model is a simple one, but such is the power of the blockchain that it is impossible to envision it occurring anywhere else. Users will always maintain full control of their data, free from any surveillance by both Aditus or a third party without the User's express consent. As the team puts it, think of Aditus as equivalent to a top tier credit card rewards program, but built exclusively for the crypto-affluent.  Founded by a team of veteran entrepreneurs in the luxury industry, the team is well poised to provide a new frontier for luxury technology, augmented by a strong core of blockchain developers to ensure that its foundations of encryption, smart contracts and payment gateways are secure for the crypto-affluent.  Discover more about the Aditus Network on their official website, https://www.aditus.net/  The article was originally posted here: https://gray-international.com/blogs/hyper-modern-magazine/luxury-for-the-crypto-affluent-introducing-the-aditus-network

Title: 💥💥💥💥🔊ANN][ADITUS 🍷] Luxury Access Platform for Crypto-Affluents
Body: For Two Days Only: Aditus to Pitch at BlockShow Asia 2017  Asia’s must-attend event for crypto-veterans, covering the entire spectrum of industry’s highest traded cryptocurrencies and the showcase of latest blockchain technologies.  Nov 23, 2017 | By LUXUO  For two days only, the premier BlockShow Asia 2017 is back this November 29 to 30, 2017. Once again, the event will provide businesses the opportunity to reveal new products, find new solutions and receive valuable feedback as well as share insights and engage in thought-provoking discussions. Attendees can look forward to exciting keynote addresses and talks by industry experts in moderated-panel discussions on stage, in addition to the new ICO pitch sessions.  Why should you attend BlockShow Asia 2017?  In the previous edition of BlockShow Asia, more than 500 deals were closed, with USD200 million raised. More than 1,000 guests attended, including blockchain experts and opinion leaders. The event brought together 500 speakers and 40-plus exhibitors, some of whom hailed from global companies and start-ups.  BlockShow Asia will collaborate with ICO-Hypethon, an event-festival created by CryptoFriends to set up the ICO Dealzone for attendees to potentially participate in hot, upcoming blockchain projects, witness the latest ICO launches in real time, as well as support them by purchasing offered tokens, getting the early jump on new investments.  Read the full article here : http://www.luxuo.com/culture/events/for-two-days-only-aditus-to-pitch-at-blockshow-asia-2017.html

Here’s all the need-to-know information:     Apply to be Whitelisted  Only approved whitelisted address can participate in our token sale:  ·      Apply to be whitelisted at https://tokensale.aditus.net ·      Verify that the domain you are on matches what is listed on our official communication channels.  Trusted Sources Only click on URLs listed on our official communication channels listed below:  ·         Website: https://www.aditus.net ·         Blog: https://medium.com/aditusnetwork ·         Telegram: https://t.me/aditusnetwork and https://t.me/aditusnet  These are the only sources of accurate, reliable and updated information on the Aditus token sale.  Whitelisting Process  Please follow the instructions accordingly:  ·       The whitelisting process involves answering and uploading your Identity document. ·       You will be notified if your application is successful, rejected or pending additional information. ·       Take the time to submit your relevant information, including your ETH wallet address accurately. ·       Do not rush the process of sending in your whitelist application. ·       Do not register multiple times.   Payment Method   Once whitelisted, you will be sent a link to a dashboard with instructions on how to send funds:  ·         Ethereum (ETH) is the only mode of payment during the token sale. ·         Each Aditus (ADI) token is priced at USD 0.05 per ADI. ·         The rate of ADI/ETH will be announced based on the ETH/USD rate at 12 pm (GMT +8) on 29 November 2017.   Thank you, everyone, for supporting Aditus!
